text: @CashApp Hello I am Kelsi Lloyd a 22 year old homeless college student living out of a hotel! The Covid-19 made me lose my housing and meal plan I barely have food or water and have nothing left! help me! I have nobody or anyone else to turn to $kelsi35 anything will help
